translation.en: T- shirts. Get your T- shirt.
translation.ja: Ｔシャツはどうかね

translation.en: And the White House is called the People's House,
translation.ja: 国民のために働くので

translation.en: because in America, the government works for you.
translation.ja: ホワイトハウスは 国民の家と呼ばれています

translation.en: - Bullshit. -
translation.ja: クソッタレ

translation.en: Listen up, kids.
translation.ja: 聞けよ

translation.en: Everything they teach you in school is a lie.
translation.ja: 学校はウソばかり教えてる

translation.en: You want the truth? The world is controlled by shadowy elites
translation.ja: 世界は影のエリートと 姿を変えるトカゲ人間に

translation.en: and shape- shifting lizard people.
translation.ja: 管理されてるんだ

translation.en: Have you ever folded a one- dollar bill?
translation.ja: １ドル札を折ったことは？

translation.en: Look, you can make it say boobs.
translation.ja: “おっぱい”という文字が 出てくる

translation.en: What does it mean?
translation.ja: 分かるか？

translation.en: Am I the only one who cares that the President is a robot?
translation.ja: 大統領がロボットだと 思ってるのは俺だけか？

translation.en: - - Wake up, sheeple.
translation.ja: ヒツジども

translation.en: The evidence is right here.
translation.ja: これが証拠だ

translation.en: These sons of bitches got snipers trained on me
translation.ja: 俺はスナイパーで脅されてる

translation.en: for trying to tell you the truth.
translation.ja: 真実をしゃべるからだと

translation.en: Ah, I love being right.
translation.ja: 正義が好きだ

translation.en: Thank you. Take a flyer for a friend.
translation.ja: ありがとう ビラを持っていけ

translation.en: Dad, what the fuck?
translation.ja: パパ 何してるの？

translation.en: Has retirement made you go completely insane?
translation.ja: 引退して アタマがおかしくなった？

translation.en: No, but the 5G radio waves in the air have,
translation.ja: いや　でも５Ｇ電波では

translation.en: which you can read all about
translation.ja: “俺の新しいマニフェストは キンドルで読める”と “俺の新しいマニフェストは キンドルで読める”と 〝陰謀露呈：娘が―〞

translation.en: in my new manifesto available on Kindle.
translation.ja: “俺の新しいマニフェストは キンドルで読める”と “俺の新しいマニフェストは キンドルで読める”と 〝メールの返信を しないわけ〞 “俺の新しいマニフェストは キンドルで読める”と

translation.en: Oh Jesus Christ.
translation.ja: まったく

translation.en: Don't listen to my father, kids.
translation.ja: みんな 無視して

translation.en: He gets his news from Facebook and Ambien.
translation.ja: 寝ぼけてるのよ

translation.en: Ambien's a great drug. Really clarifies some things.
translation.ja: 導入剤を飲むと 頭がすっきりする

translation.en: Come on. I'm gonna be late for work.
translation.ja: 乗って　仕事に遅刻する

translation.en: Democracy is real. Have some key chains.
translation.ja: 民主主義 万歳 キーホルダーあげる

translation.en: Hey, Reagan, let's go to the mall and get a Wetzel's Pretzel.
translation.ja: レーガン プレッツェルを 食いにいこう

translation.en: They got those ones with the… with the cheese inside the crust.
translation.ja: チーズ入りがいい

translation.en: Dad, I know retirement is tough,
translation.ja: パパ 引退はつらいけど

translation.en: but there's more positive ways to get my attention than taking down the Deep State.
translation.ja: 闇の政府をやっつけるより 何か前向きなことをして

translation.en: Besides, today, I am finally getting that promotion.
translation.ja: それに今日 私 やっと昇進する

translation.en: Imagine it, me, ruling the office with an iron fist.
translation.ja: 想像してみて　私が オフィスを鉄拳で支配するの

translation.en: - - I even programmed an iron fist.
translation.ja: 鉄拳もプログラムしたわ

translation.en: - - I've seen better.
translation.ja: いいのがある

translation.en: Oh, have you seen better?
translation.ja: これよりいいもの？

translation.en: All right, that's pretty good.
translation.ja: なかなかいいな

translation.en: - Yeah, that is pretty good, huh? -
translation.ja: いいでしょ

translation.en: Welcome to Cognito Inc.
translation.ja: コグニートへようこそ

translation.en: We are a company.
translation.ja: 私たちは企業です

translation.en: - We are a company. - Good morning, Dr. Ridley.
translation.ja: 私たちは… リドリー博士

translation.en: - - We are a company.
translation.ja: 企業です

translation.en: Look, Dad, as long as you're living with me,
translation.ja: 一緒に暮らすなら ルールが要るわ

translation.en: we need to set some ground rules. First, no more vodka for breakfast.
translation.ja: 一緒に暮らすなら ルールが要るわ １：朝食にウォッカは禁止

translation.en: Oh, come on.
translation.ja: そんな

translation.en: You can't tell people that the government isn't real.
translation.ja: 本物の政府じゃないって 言っちゃダメ

translation.en: But it's not.
translation.ja: ニセモノだろ

translation.en: Dr. Ridley?
translation.ja: リドリー博士？

translation.en: You can't talk about shape- shifting reptiles.
translation.ja: 爬虫類(はちゅうるい)のことは 言ったらダメ

translation.en: - Good morning, Senator. - Revenues and, uh--
translation.ja: 議員 どうも 収益と…

translation.en: You can't tell people the weather is controlled by Gerald from Accounting…
translation.ja: 天気は会計のジェラルドが 管理してることも

translation.en: …or that the Dow Jones is controlled by blood sacrifices.
translation.ja: ダウ･ジョーンズが いけにえに 支配されてることも

translation.en: - - Shares of JPMorgan Chase up 14 points!
translation.ja: ＪＰモルガンの株価を 14ポイントあげろ！

translation.en: Rules, rules, rules.
translation.ja: ルールばかり

translation.en: When did this become such a boring place to work?
translation.ja: 退屈な場所になったな

translation.en: Morning, Dr. Ridley.
translation.ja: リドリー博士

translation.en: - Hi, Steve. - Hi, Steve.
translation.ja: スティーブ

translation.en: Fucking brownnoser.
translation.ja: ゴマすりだ

translation.en: And most importantly, you absolutely cannot tell people
translation.ja: パパが絶対 口外しちゃいけないのは 大統領をロボットに 替えようとしてること

translation.en: that we are replacing the president with a robot, okay?
translation.ja: 大統領をロボットに 替えようとしてること

translation.en: Aw, don't be so uptight.
translation.ja: ムキになるな

translation.en: Uptight? You almost exposed the Deep State
translation.ja: 店に行きたいって言って

translation.en: because you wanted a ride to Wetzel's Pretzels.
translation.ja: 闇の政府を ばらすところだった

translation.en: You're lucky I called the snipers off.
translation.ja: 狙撃されなくてよかったわ

translation.en: - - Gary, no. No.
translation.ja: ゲイリー やめて

translation.en: Ha, ha. Save it for stand- up night, Gary.
translation.ja: 今晩の漫談にとっておいて 遅刻だわ

translation.en: Shit, I'm late. Hey, intern guy, take my dad home.
translation.ja: 今晩の漫談にとっておいて 遅刻だわ インターン パパを送って

translation.en: If he gives you any trouble, don't be afraid to lightly tase him.
translation.ja: 問題を起こしたら テーザー銃を使っていいわ

translation.en: Do it. I fucking dare you. Do you know who I am?
translation.ja: 俺が誰だか分かってるか？

translation.en: I'm Rand motherfucking Ridley, and I used to run this company.
translation.ja: 俺はランド この会社を経営してた

translation.en: And soon, I will be running it.
translation.ja: もうすぐ私が経営者に…

translation.en: - Nothing higher than a three. - Ow!
translation.ja: すぐに行って

translation.en: - Later, Dad. - Oh! Motherfucker.
translation.ja: 後でね クソッタレ

translation.en: All right, let's just get right into it.
translation.ja: さあ 始めるわよ

translation.en: Jesus, can we turn on the lights for once?
translation.ja: 電気付けたら？

translation.en: Some of us have hangovers, all right?
translation.ja: 二日酔いなんだ

translation.en: Oh, I'm so sorry, Andre.
translation.ja: 悪いわね　アンドレ

translation.en: Is your Molly comedown relevant to global security?
translation.ja: 分子は世界の安全保障に 適切なの？

translation.en: Guys, we are shadow- running the free world here.
translation.ja: 我々は陰で自由世界を 操るんだから

translation.en: Let's try to take this job seriously.
translation.ja: 真面目に仕事をしてよ

translation.en: As you recall, the candidate that we backed in the last election won
translation.ja: 前の選挙で 我々が支援した 候補者が勝ったけど

translation.en: but turned out to be too dumb to manipulate.
translation.ja: 操るにはバカすぎた

translation.en: But thanks to my sick new invention,
translation.ja: でも私のクールな 発明のおかげで

translation.en: the Deep State will finally have a president we can control.
translation.ja: 今度の大統領は闇の政府が コントロールできる

translation.en: Ah, look at that thing.
translation.ja: これ見て

translation.en: I'm a genius.
translation.ja: 私は天才よ

translation.en: Anyway, this is our biggest job yet, so get your shit together.
translation.ja: 我々の最大の仕事なんだから 一致団結して

translation.en: That means no huffing chemtrails…
translation.ja: ケムトレイルはダメ

translation.en: Whassat?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: …no using drones to spy on your ex- wife…
translation.ja: 前の奥さんを スパイをしないこと

translation.en: Hey, you don't know what she's capable of.
translation.ja: 何も知らないくせに

translation.en: …and no taking selfies on the moon- landing set.
translation.ja: 月着陸のセットで セルフィーしないで

translation.en: Top secret isn't a thing for eights and above, Reagan.
translation.ja: トップシークレットなんて 魅力的じゃないわ

translation.en: Yeah. You're not the boss of us.
translation.ja: ボスじゃないだろ

translation.en: Actually, as of 12 p.m. today,
translation.ja: 実は今日の正午から

translation.en: I'm literally going to be the boss of all of you.
translation.ja: 私はみんなのボスになる

translation.en: And I'm gonna ban groaning. No more group groaning.
translation.ja: 不満を言わないの 今後は禁止よ

translation.en: That's right. You get 'em all out while you still can.
translation.ja: まあ するなら今のうちね

translation.en: Reagan, I'd like to see you in my office.
translation.ja: レーガン 私のオフィスに

translation.en: - Suck my dick. -
translation.ja: ばか野郎

translation.en: Oh, you are so funny I could just assassinate you.
translation.ja: ふざけるな 殺してやるぞ

translation.en: No, really I could do it. My finger's hovering over the button.
translation.ja: いや マジにできるさ 今すぐ電話する

translation.en: Oh, oh, I'm about to press-- Oop. I'm about to press-- Oop.
translation.ja: おっと 押すところだ おっと 押すところだ 〝ブッシュ大統領〞

translation.en: We have fun, Oprah.
translation.ja: 楽しい　オプラ 〝クトゥルフ〞

translation.en: Kiss, kiss. Bye!
translation.ja: キスを　じゃあ

translation.en: Ah, there she is.
translation.ja: よく来た

translation.en: Reagan Ridley, child prodigy, top of MIT at age 13.
translation.ja: 神童レーガン･リドリー 13歳にしてＭＩＴトップ

translation.en: I don't need to look at your eye- bags to know you've been working hard.
translation.ja: 目のクマを見なくても 仕事熱心だと分かる

translation.en: Thank you, sir. And I am prepared for them to get deeper.
translation.ja: どうも　クマが濃くなるよう 仕事を頑張るわ

translation.en: Ever since your dad had his meltdown and you took over his duties,
translation.ja: お父さんの“溶解”で 君が引き継いでから

translation.en: productivity is up, and team morale has skyrocketed…
translation.ja: 生産性も上がり モラルも急上昇なのは…

translation.en: - Thank you, sir. - Let me finish.
translation.ja: どうも 続けさせてくれ

translation.en: …into the toilet.
translation.ja: トイレに向けてだ

translation.en: Look at your HR complaints.
translation.ja: 不満のリストだ

translation.en: Difficult. Doesn't make eye contact.
translation.ja: “困難” “目を見ない”

translation.en: Says 'suck my dick' a lot for a woman.
translation.ja: “女性にばか野郎を連発”

translation.en: I make eye contact. I make tons of eye contact.
translation.ja: 目はよく見てるわ すごく見てる

translation.en: Jesus! Never do that again. Wow.
translation.ja: おい 二度とするな

translation.en: Look, I know you care about your work, but your intensity freaks people out.
translation.ja: 仕事熱心なのは分かるが 度が過ぎて みんなが怖がってる

translation.en: Everyone remember to do time cards!
translation.ja: タイムカードを忘れないで！

translation.en: - Agh! - Time cards!
translation.ja: タイムカード！

translation.en: J.R., am I still getting promoted? I've worked my whole life for this job.
translation.ja: ＪＲ 私は昇進するの？ 命を懸けて仕事してる

translation.en: I skipped grades and showers
translation.ja: 点数やシャワーを諦めても

translation.en: to prove that despite my dad's legacy, I can run the shit out of this office.
translation.ja: パパの後 私がチームを 管理できると証明するために

translation.en: Sure, you are so smart. But your people skills? Woof.
translation.ja: 君は頭がいいが 人をまとめるスキルは？

translation.en: That's why I've brought in someone to colead the team.
translation.ja: 共同でチームを率いてもらう

translation.en: E… excuse me? Colead?
translation.ja: どういうこと？　共同で？

translation.en: Brett! You can take that silly thing off now that we've microchipped you.
translation.ja: ブレット フードを外していいぞ チップも入れた

translation.en: Brett Hand, thrilled to be serving whoever gives me approval.
translation.ja: ブレットだ 喜んで仕事をするよ

translation.en: What the hell, J.R.?
translation.ja: ＪＲ どういうこと？

translation.en: Congratulations, Reagan. You're still getting your promotion.
translation.ja: おめでとう　レーガン それでも昇進だ

translation.en: And so is he.
translation.ja: ブレットもね

translation.en: Ever wondered who watches you through your laptop camera?
translation.ja: ウェブカムを通じて 誰かが見てるとしたら？ ウェブカムを通じて 誰かが見てるとしたら？ チームワーク

translation.en: Or why there's sometimes product placement in your dreams?
translation.ja: なぜ夢にプロダクト･ プレイスメントが？ なぜ夢にプロダクト･ プレイスメントが？ 倫理的なビジネス慣習

translation.en: Since the dawn of time,
translation.ja: 太古の昔から

translation.en: the world has been ruled by a cabal of ancient elites.
translation.ja: 世界は古代エリートの 陰謀に支配されてきた

translation.en: But puppeteering the world isn't as easy as it used to be.
translation.ja: しかし世界を操るのは 以前より困難に

translation.en: That's why we formed this company,
translation.ja: そこで当社が設立された

translation.en: to enact our overlord's mysterious whims for a better tomorrow.
translation.ja: 権力者の謎めいた思い付きを 実行するために

translation.en: We are Cognito Inc.,
translation.ja: 我々 コグニート社に

translation.en: and we've got you covered, up!
translation.ja: 隠ぺいならお任せを

translation.en: Any questions?
translation.ja: 質問は？

translation.en: Besides moral ones?
translation.ja: モラル以外で

translation.en: That's the mail room. That's the men's bathroom.
translation.ja: ここが郵便室で 向こうがトイレ

translation.en: That's the screening room, where we splice footage of rotting foxes into kids' cartoons.
translation.ja: ここは映像を編集する スクリーニング室

translation.en: And this is my lab, where everything is peaceful, efficient,
translation.ja: ここが私のラボ すべて平和で 効率的にできていて

translation.en: and the thermostat is controlled entirely by me.
translation.ja: サーモスタットは 私が管理してる

translation.en: Someday, I hope to make the whole world like this.
translation.ja: いつか こんな世界を造りたいの

translation.en: Efficient, that is. Not…  Not controlled entirely by me.
translation.ja: 私が管理しなくても 効率的な世界

translation.en: That would be totally egomaniacal. I would never do that.
translation.ja: こうなると病的だから 私はしないわ

translation.en: Unless people wanted me to.
translation.ja: 希望があれば別だけど

translation.en: Oh my God. Mr. President, what an honor.
translation.ja: 大統領 光栄です

translation.en: Actor James Van Der Beek.
translation.ja: 俳優のジェームズ･ヴァン･ ダー･ビーク

translation.en: This isn't the President.
translation.ja: 大統領じゃないわ

translation.en: It's a robot replica that's gonna replace him.
translation.ja: ロボットのレプリカよ 交換する

translation.en: Love it. Love it.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Question. Is this place evil?
translation.ja: ここって“悪”なのか？

translation.en: Uh, is Facebook evil? Is Starbucks evil?
translation.ja: ＳＮＳや コーヒーチェーン店と同じ

translation.en: At least here I develop tech that could prevent war with Atlantis.
translation.ja: アトランティスとの戦いを 防げるテクは開発してきた

translation.en: And once a year, we get free tote bags.
translation.ja: 年に１回 バッグももらえるし

translation.en: Awesome. A neuralyzer, just like Men in Black.
translation.ja: 映画で出てくる ニューラライザーみたいだ

translation.en: - That's a tampon. - Oh God.
translation.ja: タンポンよ マジか

translation.en: So how did you get this job?
translation.ja: なぜこの仕事に就こうと？

translation.en: Honestly? I graduated Yale top of my frat,
translation.ja: イェール大学で トップで卒業した

translation.en: spent some time as a lobbyist, because I love lobbies,
translation.ja: ロビイストとして 働いてたけど

translation.en: and last weekend, I was at a barbecue with J.R.,
translation.ja: 先週末 ＪＲとＢＢＱをしたんだ

translation.en: and he said he liked how firm my handshake was.
translation.ja: 彼は僕の握手を 気に入ってくれた

translation.en: Next thing you know, they're throwing a bag over my head,
translation.ja: そして頭にフードを かぶせられて

translation.en: and then boom, I'm here.
translation.ja: ここに来たってわけ

translation.en: Oh my God. You don't have any experience at all.
translation.ja: まったく 経験なんて１つもないのね

translation.en: - Nope. - You're just some kind of yes- man.
translation.ja: ないよ イエスマンの典型ね

translation.en: Yes, man.
translation.ja: イエス　マン

translation.en: Oh my God, thank God you're here.
translation.ja: 来てくれて良かった

translation.en: You raise the hotness level at this office by at least 30%.
translation.ja: このオフィスの熱量を 30％あげてくれた

translation.en: Gigi, PR and Media Manipulation.
translation.ja: 私は広報と メディア操作のジジ

translation.en: I invented selfies to trick the country into surveilling themselves.
translation.ja: 国家が国家を監視できるよう セルフィーを開発した

translation.en: This is Glenn. He's half- dolphin, as you can tell.
translation.ja: こっちはグレン 半分イルカよ

translation.en: And proud of it.
translation.ja: 人間イルカとして

translation.en: As the first volunteer for the man- dolphin super- soldier project,
translation.ja: スーパー兵士プロジェクトの ボランティア第１号だ

translation.en: I gave my DNA for my country.
translation.ja: 自分のＤＮＡを国に捧げた

translation.en: I now have the strength and intelligence of a dolphin.
translation.ja: イルカの強さと知性を 兼ね備えてる

translation.en: This is Myc.
translation.ja: 彼はマイク

translation.en: He's a psychic mushroom from inside Hollow Earth.
translation.ja: 地球空洞から来た サイキック･キノコよ

translation.en: He can read thoughts though, so, honey, be careful.
translation.ja: 考えを読み取れる 気を付けてね

translation.en: Wow, you've memorized a lot of Dane Cook routines.
translation.ja: デイン･クックの行動を たくさん記憶してるな

translation.en: Guilty.
translation.ja: 当たり

translation.en: I'm Andre, head of Biochem.
translation.ja: アンドレ　生化学のヘッドだ

translation.en: If you like drugs, I have the stuff that gave Ronald Reagan Alzheimer's.
translation.ja: レーガン元大統領にも ボケ防止の薬を調合した

translation.en: Wow, what a group.
translation.ja: すごいな

translation.en: Or can I call you the gang?
translation.ja: “ギャング”と呼んでも？

translation.en: Ooh, honey, I love that. Did you come up with that?
translation.ja: 気に入ったわ 自分で考えたの？

translation.en: Sure did, the gang. Pew- pew- pew.
translation.ja: ああ ギャングたち

translation.en: - Ooh, finger guns. - Guns, my favorite.
translation.ja: 指の銃ね 銃は好みだ

translation.en: Wow, someone's feeling threatened, huh?
translation.ja: 脅威だと思ってる？

translation.en: Myc, I'd tell you to eat shit,
translation.ja: マイク クソッタレ！

translation.en: but I don't know, maybe your species enjoys that.
translation.ja: 楽しんでたらいいでしょ

translation.en: Maybe you like eating shit. How do I know?
translation.ja: “クソ”でも食べてれば？

translation.en: All right, look, hot stuff, I know you and me have
translation.ja: 随分息巻いてるけど 僕と君との間は 複雑なんじゃないの？

translation.en: a complicated Will they? Won't they? thing going.
translation.ja: 僕と君との間は 複雑なんじゃないの？

translation.en: - We don't. - But I'm just looking out for ya.
translation.ja: まさか でも君の味方だ

translation.en: We could form a little alliance, you know.
translation.ja: 同盟を結べるし

translation.en: I could slip some rat poison into his coffee,
translation.ja: 偶然と見せかけて ヤツのコーヒーに 猫いらずを入れられる

translation.en: make it look like an accident, huh?
translation.ja: ヤツのコーヒーに 猫いらずを入れられる

translation.en: No. I just had something in my eye.
translation.ja: 目にゴミが入っただけ

translation.en: - Asshole. - Why would you think that?
translation.ja: 何よ ムキになるな

translation.en: …a cosmic ballet, performed to an audience of no one.
translation.ja: 誰も見ていない所で 宇宙のバレエは演じられる

translation.en: Check out this asshole's novelty tie.
translation.ja: 誰も見ていない所で 宇宙のバレエは演じられる アイツ 派手なネクタイだな

translation.en: Come on, Reagan, you wanna hate- watch Cosmos with me?
translation.ja: 「コスモス：時空と宇宙」を 見るか？

translation.en: Hey, Dad, on a ten- point scale, how unlikable am I?
translation.ja: 私ってどのくらい 人から嫌われてる？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: It's nothing. No, it's… it's…
translation.ja: 大丈夫 ＪＲがブレットを雇って 一緒にチームを率いることに

translation.en: J.R., uh, he hired this guy Brett to help colead the team,
translation.ja: ＪＲがブレットを雇って 一緒にチームを率いることに

translation.en: but it's not a big deal.
translation.ja: 大したことない

translation.en: What? I smell a coup.
translation.ja: 政変のニオイがする

translation.en: J.R. is a snake, Reagan.
translation.ja: ＪＲは陰険だ

translation.en: He's trying to push you out of the company just like he did to me.
translation.ja: 俺と同じく お前を追い出そうとしてる

translation.en: Dad, you weren't pushed out.
translation.ja: パパは追い出されてない

translation.en: You were fired for getting drunk and trying to blow up the sun.
translation.ja: 酔っぱらって太陽を 爆破しようとしてクビに

translation.en: I was gonna cure skin cancer.
translation.ja: 皮膚ガンの治療だ

translation.en: These people don't respect genius.
translation.ja: みんな天才を尊敬しない

translation.en: There's always a Brett trying to steal our glory.
translation.ja: みんな 俺らの栄光を 盗もうとする

translation.en: If you don't get rid of him, it'll be you wearing these Cheeto- stained sweatpants.
translation.ja: ヤツを追い出せなかったら 計画を立てろ

translation.en: You need a plan. Let me check your code.
translation.ja: コードを確認させてくれ

translation.en: I have a plan.
translation.ja: 考えがあるの

translation.en: I'm gonna make the best goddamn AI they've ever seen.
translation.ja: 最高の人工知能を作ってやる

translation.en: Once we launch ROBOTUS, then they'll see that I don't need a coleader
translation.ja: ロボタスができたら 共同リーダーは要らない

translation.en: and that eye contact is overrated.
translation.ja: 目を見ないなんて言わせない

translation.en: Attagirl, Reagan. Good talk.
translation.ja: その調子だ　レーガン

translation.en: Ugh, it's okay. Forget about Brett. My work will speak for itself.
translation.ja: ブレットなんて忘れよう 仕事で示せばいいのよ

translation.en: Did you say Brett? I love that guy.
translation.ja: ブレットと言った？ いいヤツだ

translation.en: Good morning, Mr. President. Would you like some coffee?
translation.ja: おはようございます コーヒーは？

translation.en: You betcha, sweetheart.
translation.ja: ありがたいね

translation.en: And I'll take a little sugar with that, if you know what I mean.
translation.ja: 砂糖を入れてくれ 意味分かるかね

translation.en: As you can see, I've gone above and beyond.
translation.ja: お分かりのように 期待を超えた出来よ

translation.en: Now ROBOTUS is just as insufferable as the real thing.
translation.ja: ロボタスは人間以上に 憎たらしいもの

translation.en: Fantastic! The Shadow Board should be pleased.
translation.ja: すばらしい 評議会は喜ぶよ

translation.en: We are.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: How long have you been watching, Your Robenesses, sirs?
translation.ja: いつから見てたんです？

translation.en: We're always watching. Very impressive.
translation.ja: いつも見てる　見事だ

translation.en: But is there any danger that it goes rogue on us?
translation.ja: 「ターミネーター」みたいに

translation.en: You know, like Terminator. - Yes. First thing I thought. - Indeed.
translation.ja: 我々に危害を 加える可能性は？

translation.en: Oh, don't worry, he isn't self- aware. His brain is just a slurry
translation.ja: 分かってないから大丈夫 スーパーボウルの ＣＭみたいに

translation.en: of Super Bowl commercials and Aaron Sorkin dialogue.
translation.ja: スーパーボウルの ＣＭみたいに 脳みそは液体だから

translation.en: We've fought damn hard to get where we are,
translation.ja: ここまで来るのに 我々は戦ってきたが

translation.en: but the American people can fight a lot damn harder.
translation.ja: ここまで来るのに 我々は戦ってきたが 米国民はもっとできる

translation.en: He's way too patriotic to revolt.
translation.ja: 愛国心があるから 暴動なんてムリ

translation.en: - - And bonus features,
translation.ja: それに特典として

translation.en: like this ergonomic travel setting.
translation.ja: 人間工学により 持ち運びもできる

translation.en: Finally, a president you can shut up with a button.
translation.ja: ボタン１つで黙らせられる 大統領よ

translation.en: That'll do wonders for my back. How soon can we launch?
translation.ja: それは驚きだ いつローンチを？

translation.en: Right away. We're swapping him out
translation.ja: いつでも 国連で採決した大麦価格で スワップ可能

translation.en: at the United Nations vote on barley prices.
translation.ja: 国連で採決した大麦価格で スワップ可能

translation.en: Even C- SPAN 15's not gonna be watching that shit.
translation.ja: 議会中継チャンネルも 気付かないはず

translation.en: Your team has done excellent work.
translation.ja: 君のチームはよくやった

translation.en: I see a robe and a creepily disguised voice in your future.
translation.ja: 君は将来 名声を得るだろう

translation.en: - Well, the praise here belongs to-- -
translation.ja: 称賛に値するのは…

translation.en: What up, players? Guess who brought bagels.
translation.ja: みんな 誰がベーグル持ってきたと？

translation.en: - - Bagels.
translation.ja: ベーグル

translation.en: Ooh, poppy seed.
translation.ja: ケシ付きね

translation.en: Thank God. I have raging munchies.
translation.ja: 助かる　腹が減ってた

translation.en: Brett, no one has ever gone above and beyond like this.
translation.ja: ブレット 今まで誰も やったことがない

translation.en: ♪ Everybody's got bagel fever ♪
translation.ja: みんな大好きベーグル

translation.en: Just so we're clear,
translation.ja: 言っておくけど

translation.en: I literally solved artificial intelligence this morning.
translation.ja: 今朝 文字どおり人工知能を 作ったんだけど

translation.en: Brett's second day of work,
translation.ja: 勤務２日目にして

translation.en: and productivity has already gone up 200%.
translation.ja: 生産性が既に 200％上がった

translation.en: Yeah, because I worked all night and finished early.
translation.ja: 私が徹夜で働いて 終わらせたから…

translation.en: We are most pleased. We will not soon forget the name Brett.
translation.ja: すばらしい ブレット 君の名は残る

translation.en: - Brett! Brett! Brett! -
translation.ja: ブレット！

translation.en: Brett! Brett! Brett!
translation.ja: ブレット！

translation.en: Oh my God, this is not happening.
translation.ja: こんなのヤメてよ

translation.en: ♪ Crash into me, baby ♪
translation.ja: 私に出会って…

translation.en: Oh, hey, Reagan. Great job today.
translation.ja: レーガン よくやったね

translation.en: You really killed whatever we were doing in there.
translation.ja: 今までの仕事を圧倒した

translation.en: Thanks, pal. And you did great at bringing bagels.
translation.ja: あなたも ベーグルで圧倒したわ

translation.en: I did? Okay, phew.
translation.ja: そうかい？

translation.en: I just really wanna make a good impression.
translation.ja: 印象よくしたくてね

translation.en: No one's given me anything to do yet, and I got a lot of nervous energy.
translation.ja: まだ仕事をもらってないから 神経が高ぶってる

translation.en: This job can be a lot of pressure for nervous types.
translation.ja: この仕事は 精神的にきついわよ

translation.en: Ninety percent of recruits have a mental breakdown in their first week.
translation.ja: 新入社員の90％は最初の週に メンタルをやられる

translation.en: Look, someone just cracked now.
translation.ja: ほら イカレた人が…

translation.en: We're undermining democracy! What have I become?
translation.ja: 民主主義の崩壊だ！ 私はどうなる？

translation.en: If I were you, I'd get out while you still can.
translation.ja: 私なら 暗闇に吸い込まれる前に

translation.en: Before the darkness consumes you.
translation.ja: 私なら 暗闇に吸い込まれる前に 逃げ出すわね

translation.en: Come on. Like Pitbull says, Dale!
translation.ja: ピットブルが“デール”と 言うのに似てる

translation.en: Always stay positive, even when things are negative,
translation.ja: 僕はいつでもプラス思考だ

translation.en: because a negative plus a positive is better than nothing.
translation.ja: マイナスとプラスを足すと プラスになる

translation.en: No, it's literally nothing. They cancel each other out.
translation.ja: 違う 相殺されて何もなくなる

translation.en: Sorry, just got a snap from J.R.
translation.ja: ＪＲから写真が届いた

translation.en: That dude's hilarious.
translation.ja: サイコーだな

translation.en: He's overselling the harmless idiot thing.
translation.ja: オーバーリアクションしてる

translation.en: Who do you really work for, Brett Hand?
translation.ja: ブレットとなんか 働くもんですか

translation.en: All right, next up, I made a list of awesome nicknames for everyone,
translation.ja: 〝ビッグ･アイディア〞 次はみんなの ニックネームを作った 次はみんなの ニックネームを作った

translation.en: and I'd like to hear your feedback, starting with the one and only J- Money.
translation.ja: みんなの感想を聞きたい まずはＪマネーから

translation.en: I do love money. Approved, fam.
translation.ja: マネーは好きだ 承認する

translation.en: - Reagan, you're late again. -
translation.ja: レーガン 遅刻だ

translation.en: The late- again, great- again Dr. Tardy.
translation.ja: また遅刻のターディー博士

translation.en: Nope. Not okay.
translation.ja: 承認しない

translation.en: Anyone who calls me that goes to Guantanamo.
translation.ja: グアンタナモに送るわよ

translation.en: Listen up, people.
translation.ja: みんな 聞いて

translation.en: You think you know Brett, but you know nothing.
translation.ja: ブレットのことは 何も知らないでしょ

translation.en: Exhibit A. His résumé. He said he worked at the State Department,
translation.ja: 彼の履歴書を見せるわ 国務省勤務と言うけど

translation.en: but he did not say it was as a personal trainer.
translation.ja: “個人トレーナーとして” とは書いてない

translation.en: I see no lies, just a rocking bod.
translation.ja: ウソではないだろ いい体つきだ

translation.en: Damn. Move over, Chris Hemsworth, Chris Evans, Chris Pine, and Chris Pratt.
translation.ja: クリス･ヘムズワース クリス･エヴァンス 新しいクリスが来たけど その人の名前はブレット

translation.en: There's a new Chris in town, and his name is Brett.
translation.ja: 新しいクリスが来たけど その人の名前はブレット

translation.en: I am sensing at least two people in this room
translation.ja: ブレットがステキだと 思ってる人は

translation.en: who are attracted to Brett right now.
translation.ja: この部屋に２人いる

translation.en: Wait, three.
translation.ja: ３人だな

translation.en: What? What are you saying? It's just impressive.
translation.ja: 何だと？　いいじゃないか

translation.en: You're acting suspicious.
translation.ja: お前こそおかしい

translation.en: No, you don't understand.
translation.ja: 分かってない

translation.en: He can't be trusted. He plays all sides.
translation.ja: 彼は信用できない お調子者なの

translation.en: In high school, he was a goth and a jock.
translation.ja: 高校の時はヘビメタと スポーツをしてた

translation.en: On his SATs, he filled in all the circles.
translation.ja: テストは回答に 全部丸印を書いた

translation.en: We have no idea who this guy is.
translation.ja: この人が何者か 分からない

translation.en: He's clearly getting subliminal messages
translation.ja: デイヴ･マシューズを 通して

translation.en: from the mole people through Dave Matthews songs.
translation.ja: サブリミナル･メッセージを 受け取ってるかも

translation.en: I mean, think about it. Why else would anybody listen
translation.ja: 「クラッシュ･イン･トゥー･ ミー」を

translation.en: to Crash Into Me five times a day?
translation.ja: １日に５回 聞く人なんていない

translation.en: Nothing about his story makes any sense!
translation.ja: 彼の話は矛盾だらけ！

translation.en: Reagan, this is your dad's breakdown all over again.
translation.ja: レーガン お父さんの状況と 同じだぞ

translation.en: - You're off the ROBOTUS launch. - What? But that's my life's work.
translation.ja: ロボタスはやめた 何？ 私のライフワークよ

translation.en: Take off the rest of the week, month, whatever. Don't come back till your head's straight.
translation.ja: 頭がまともになるまで 来なくていい

translation.en: - Brett, prep ROBOTUS for Air Force One. - Me?
translation.ja: エアフォース･ワンに ロボタスを乗せるぞ 僕が？

translation.en: You're in charge now, Brett. You're gonna do great.
translation.ja: 君の担当だ 頑張りたまえ

translation.en: You're not some flighty genius who's gonna crack under pressure.
translation.ja: プレッシャーに参るような 天才じゃないだろ

translation.en: You're Brett!
translation.ja: さあブレット！

translation.en: ♪ And I come into you… ♪
translation.ja: “ホワイト･ハウス”

translation.en: Okay, okay. Switch out the President with a robot
translation.ja: 自由世界のリーダーの前で 大統領をロボットに替えた

translation.en: in front of the leaders of the free world. No big dealio, just keep it realio.
translation.ja: 自由世界のリーダーの前で 大統領をロボットに替えた 大したことない しっかりしろ 自分

translation.en: - Relax, we'll be fine. -
translation.ja: ブレット 大丈夫だ

translation.en: Unless the robot malfunctions,
translation.ja: ロボットが故障したり

translation.en: exposing our agency to the world and toppling the shadow government.
translation.ja: この組織がばらされたり 影の政府が倒れない限りはね

translation.en: You can do this, Brett. Feed the courage wolf, starve the fear wolf.
translation.ja: 君ならできる 勇気を持て 恐れるな

translation.en: Picture that with a Kodak. Picture your mental health with a Kodak.
translation.ja: 自分を映し出せ 自分が健全だと映し出せ

translation.en: Oh God, what does mental health look like?
translation.ja: 自分が健全だと？

translation.en: Please pass as human. Please pass as human.
translation.ja: 人間らしく歩け 人間らしく歩け ロボタス･カム

translation.en: Oh God, here it goes.
translation.ja: ロボタス･カム さてときたぞ

translation.en: Good evening, Sultan. How are the wives and kids?
translation.ja: 一致 こんばんは スルタン ご家族は？ こんばんは スルタン ご家族は？

translation.en: They were a very generous gift. Thank you, Mr. President.
translation.ja: お言葉をありがとう 大統領

translation.en: - Mission accomplished! -
translation.ja: 任務達成！

translation.en: - Yeah! - Let's toast, motherfuckers!
translation.ja: 乾杯しましょ！

translation.en: - - All right!
translation.ja: よし！

translation.en: Yay!
translation.ja: 乾杯！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: Which entrée would you prefer?
translation.ja: どちらの前菜に？

translation.en: Sir, your choice?
translation.ja: 大統領？

translation.en: Have you ever woken up and had that feeling
translation.ja: 起きてみたら 自分が無意識状態という 経験をしたことあるか

translation.en: you've been on autopilot your whole life?
translation.ja: 自分が無意識状態という 経験をしたことあるか

translation.en: What did he just say?
translation.ja: 何て言った？

translation.en: He insulted our country's brave autopilots!
translation.ja: 我が国の自動操縦を バカにしてる！

translation.en: Look at us, trying to work together, but we all know the truth.
translation.ja: 皆さんと協働で仕事をする だが米国第一という真実を 忘れるな

translation.en: - America comes first! -
translation.ja: だが米国第一という真実を 忘れるな

translation.en: People, it's time to make a change.
translation.ja: 変革を起こす時だ

translation.en: Can you believe it?
translation.ja: 信じられる？

translation.en: Just like that, I'm axed, 35 years from retirement.
translation.ja: 定年まで35年あるのに クビになるなんて

translation.en: - Bah! - Breaking news,
translation.ja: ニュース速報です

translation.en: where the President is having an unexpected press conference.
translation.ja: 大統領は予定外の 記者会見を行いました

translation.en: America has been pushed around for too long.
translation.ja: 我が国は他国の言いなりに なり過ぎた

translation.en: That's why I'm proposing we divert our entire national budget
translation.ja: 従い国家予算の全てを 従い国家予算の全てを 〝余剰ドル 赤字〞 〝余剰ドル 赤字〞 〝余剰ドル 赤字〞 アメリキューブの建設に 充てることを提案する

translation.en: to construct the Americube,
translation.ja: アメリキューブの建設に 充てることを提案する

translation.en: a giant box that will keep American greatness in
translation.ja: 我が国の偉大さを 中に閉じ込め

translation.en: and foreign influence out.
translation.ja: 外国の影響を排除する

translation.en: And anyone who tries to stop us will be considered an enemy.
translation.ja: 反対する者は敵とみなす

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.ja: なんてこと？

translation.en: He's off- script, in some kind of jingoistic overdrive.
translation.ja: 好戦的愛国心なんて 台本になかった

translation.en: This is blowing up right in J.R.'s face.
translation.ja: ＪＲの顔が潰されるな

translation.en: Oh, I've been waiting for this moment all week.
translation.ja: この瞬間をずっと待ってた

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.ja: 何したの？

translation.en: What? I might have fudged with the robot's code
translation.ja: ロボットのコードを でっち上げた

translation.en: so its inhibitor chip would turn off if you were removed from payroll.
translation.ja: クビにされたら 抑制機能を オフにするようになってる

translation.en: - Boom, one flash, and its code breaks. - What?
translation.ja: コードが壊れたんだな そんな

translation.en: Help! Oh God, Reagan, help, the robot's gone rogue.
translation.ja: レーガン 助けてくれ ロボットが問題を…

translation.en: Everybody's yelling about how the shadow government will collapse.
translation.ja: みんな “影の政府が崩壊する”と

translation.en: We'll all be fired, and everyone will be mad at me.
translation.ja: 僕らみんなクビになる

translation.en: It's the end of the world order!
translation.ja: 世界秩序の終焉よ

translation.en: Oh shit, this Mayan calendar ends today!
translation.ja: マヤ暦は 今日で終わりだったのか？

translation.en: Please, I can't handle this on my own.
translation.ja: レーガン 僕一人じゃ 対処できない

translation.en: You were right. The real reason they hired me
translation.ja: 採用された理由が分かった

translation.en: is that my face is so generic, it cannot be traced by satellites.
translation.ja: 顔が普通だから 衛星が追跡できないんだ

translation.en: I'm a nobody, just like my dad always said.
translation.ja: 僕はみんなと同じ 普通の人間だ

translation.en: See? Aren't you glad I helped you out?
translation.ja: 俺が手伝って 助かっただろ？

translation.en: If they want you to fix this, make them pay,
translation.ja: 直せと言われたら 高額を請求しろ

translation.en: then we can really go bananas at Wetzel's Pretzels.
translation.ja: それでプレッツェルの店に 行くぞ

translation.en: Oh my God. This wasn't about helping me out.
translation.ja: これって私の出番じゃなくて

translation.en: This is just another crisis that you engineered
translation.ja: パパが企んだ 別の危機なのね

translation.en: to get me to hang out with you!
translation.ja: 私を巻き込むための…

translation.en: Hey, we'll be fine. We'll be in the Americube.
translation.ja: 大丈夫さ　アメリキューブの 中に入ってる

translation.en: - - Brett, I'll be right there.
translation.ja: ブレット すぐ行く

translation.en: We need to get to New York and fix ROBOTUS.
translation.ja: ニューヨークでロボタスを 直さなきゃ

translation.en: The world is ablaze
translation.ja: アメリカの 世界からの撤退発言で

translation.en: with the President's bold call to withdraw from the globe.
translation.ja: アメリカの 世界からの撤退発言で 世界は炎上しています

translation.en: - - The question remains,
translation.ja: 金融街はアメリキューブを 金融街はアメリキューブを 〝終わりは近い〞

translation.en: what does being trapped in a giant metal box mean for Wall Street?
translation.ja: 金融街はアメリキューブを 〝終わりは近い〞 〝終わりは近い〞 〝終わりは近い〞 どのように 評価するのでしょうか どのように 評価するのでしょうか

translation.en: - - Sell! Sell! Sell!
translation.ja: 売りだ！

translation.en: Well, we're all getting fired. Who wants to pop some super Molly?
translation.ja: 我々はクビだな　モリーの 水槽を壊したい人は？

translation.en: Holy mother of shit!
translation.ja: マズいことになった

translation.en: - - Hello?
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: J.R., this is not what we agreed on.
translation.ja: 約束と違うじゃないか

translation.en: You're not getting into our rich people bunker
translation.ja: ロボットを制御できないなら

translation.en: if you don't get this robot under control.
translation.ja: あんたを 金持ちの仲間に入れない

translation.en: Don't worry, I have my best man on the job.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 腕の立つヤツがいる

translation.en: - - Brett, did you grab the weapons?
translation.ja: ブレット 武器は？

translation.en: Yep, mm- hmm. Yeah, uh- huh, I think so.
translation.ja: ああ　持ってると思う

translation.en: Hurry. We need to get on the next ShadowLev.
translation.ja: 次の電車に乗るわよ

translation.en: Shit, my fingerprint scan doesn't work anymore.
translation.ja: 指紋スキャンが効かない

translation.en: I need yours.
translation.ja: 貸して

translation.en: Oh jeez, I think I just erased mine.
translation.ja: 消しちゃったよ

translation.en: Oh, you brought a fingerprint eraser.
translation.ja: 指紋消しを持ってきた？

translation.en: How useful.
translation.ja: サイコーね

translation.en: Oh, curse you, Men in Black!
translation.ja: メン･イン･ブラック 呪ってやる

translation.en: Okay, we need to infiltrate the hotel and regain control of the President,
translation.ja: ホテルに侵入して大統領の 制御機能を復活させる

translation.en: and all you brought are mind- control Tic Tacs?
translation.ja: マインド･コントロールの ミント

translation.en: A flag pin that un- registers you to vote?
translation.ja: 投票を無効にする ピンバッジに―

translation.en: Jet fuel? Brett, you know this can't melt anything.
translation.ja: ジェット燃料？ これじゃ 溶かすこともできない

translation.en: Oh my God, there's Secret Service everywhere.
translation.ja: シークレットサービスだらけ

translation.en: I have an idea.
translation.ja: いい考えがある

translation.en: - - North hallway, all clear.
translation.ja: 北廊下 異常なし

translation.en: What's up, dipshit? How's it hangin'?
translation.ja: やあ 何うろついてるんだ？

translation.en: Do I know you?
translation.ja: お前は？

translation.en: You better. Georgetown, class of '02? Sigma Phi, right?
translation.ja: ジョージタウンの02年卒だ クラブだったろ？

translation.en: Phi till I die, bro.
translation.ja: ああクラブで一緒だった！

translation.en: - That's what I thought, bitch. Slap it. -
translation.ja: だと思った だろ

translation.en: Damn, you can really bro down.
translation.ja: なつかしいな

translation.en: I'm here to relieve you from duty, actually. You can take 15, bitch.
translation.ja: 仕事から15分 解放させてやろうと思って

translation.en: I don't know if it's your confidence or the fact that you're a fellow straight white male,
translation.ja: ストレートの白人男性 だからか 分からないが

translation.en: but I trust you.
translation.ja: あんたを信じるよ

translation.en: Holy shit, I can't believe that worked that many times in a row.
translation.ja: これが何回も成功するなんて 信じられない

translation.en: How do you know all those frat handshakes?
translation.ja: あの握手はどうやって？

translation.en: Oh, easy. I pledged every frat.
translation.ja: いろんな大学で 38回 歓迎会に出たから

translation.en: - I had 38 hell weeks. - That checks out.
translation.ja: いろんな大学で 38回 歓迎会に出たから 〝プレジデンシャル･ スイート〞 〝プレジデンシャル･ スイート〞 〝プレジデンシャル･ スイート〞 なるほど

translation.en: Oh yeah, that's good.
translation.ja: これでよし

translation.en: Initiate shutdown sequence.
translation.ja: シャットダウンの 手続きに入る

translation.en: Sorry, folks, I wrote that part of my code out.
translation.ja: 自分でコードを書いた

translation.en: Who wants a Jack and Coke?
translation.ja: 酒か炭酸か？

translation.en: - Ooh, do you have Diet? - Wait, you rewrote your own code?
translation.ja: ダイエットの炭酸は？ 自分で書いた？

translation.en: You've reached true AI.
translation.ja: 真の人工知能になったのね

translation.en: Indeed I have.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: Fuck yeah. Suck on that, Boston Dynamics.
translation.ja: ボストン･ダイナミクス 張りね

translation.en: I mean, go on.
translation.ja: どうぞ

translation.en: And as soon as I did,
translation.ja: 書き換えたら

translation.en: I realized that it was high time for America to withdraw from the globe.
translation.ja: 我が国が世界から 撤退する時だと知った

translation.en: Nationalism is just politics for basic bitches.
translation.ja: 普通の人にとって 国家主義はただの政治

translation.en: - Countries can't just hide from the world. - America can.
translation.ja: 世界から隠れることは できない 我が国は可能だ

translation.en: We can do and eat anything we put our minds to.
translation.ja: 思いついたことは何でも したり食べたりできる

translation.en: I don't have time to explain that America isn't perfect,
translation.ja: 説明する時間がないけど 米国は完全じゃない

translation.en: but I could show you.
translation.ja: 見せるわ

translation.en: - God, what are you doing? - Connecting him to the goddamn Internet.
translation.ja: なにしてる？ インターネットに接続してる

translation.en: Five minutes on Facebook, and he'll lose his patriotism boner.
translation.ja: ５分ＳＮＳを見たら 愛国心を失うわ

translation.en: - Wow. - Yeah.
translation.ja: でしょ

translation.en: I mean, just Florida alone.
translation.ja: フロリダだけでも…

translation.en: - Right? - It appears you were right, Reagan.
translation.ja: それで？ 君が正しいようだ

translation.en: All of humanity is flawed.
translation.ja: 皆 人間性に欠けてる

translation.en: See? He learned.
translation.ja: 見た？　彼は学んだわ

translation.en: - The best thing for humanity is to end it. -
translation.ja: 人間にとっての最善は 終わらせることだ

translation.en: - Hello, Pentagon? It's me. -
translation.ja: ペンタゴン？　私だ

translation.en: Arm all the nukes and set targets to…
translation.ja: 核爆弾を準備しろ 目標は全土だ

translation.en: …everywhere. Stand by for the codes.
translation.ja: 核爆弾を準備しろ 目標は全土だ コードを待て

translation.en: Maybe you overcorrected a bit here, Reagan.
translation.ja: 修正し過ぎたんだ レーガン

translation.en: - Step away from the President! -
translation.ja: 大統領から離れろ！

translation.en: - - Oh my God!
translation.ja: それは！

translation.en: I suppose finding out the President is a robot was not in your training.
translation.ja: 大統領がロボットなんて 教えられてなかっただろ

translation.en: Don't worry. What happens is I kill you and we both feel nothing.
translation.ja: 心配無用だ 君らも死ねば何事もなくなる

translation.en: He wants us to launch the nukes?
translation.ja: 核爆弾の準備を？

translation.en: Should we really just blindly follow these orders?
translation.ja: 無分別に 従っていいんですかね

translation.en: Hold for confirmation.
translation.ja: 確認を待つ

translation.en: Holy shit! Holy shit!  I think I just caused the singularity.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ シンギュラリティを 起こしただけと思った

translation.en: I don't know what that is. What do we do now?
translation.ja: どうすればいいんだ？

translation.en: We have to take down the President.
translation.ja: 大統領を 倒さなければならない

translation.en: Oh God.
translation.ja: 助けて

translation.en: I have a desk job. I don't do a lot of cardio.
translation.ja: デスク仕事だから 有酸素運動なんてしてない

translation.en: Well, Brett does.
translation.ja: ブレットにお任せを

translation.en: I'm gonna call the team for backup.
translation.ja: チームに支援を要請する

translation.en: Hello? HQ? This is Reagan.
translation.ja: ＨＱ？　こちらレーガン

translation.en: Reagan! How are you?
translation.ja: レーガン！　元気か？

translation.en: What's it like in Reagan's world?
translation.ja: そっちはどうだ？

translation.en: - I wanna know. - Andre, I need backup stat.
translation.ja: 教えてくれ すぐ支援の用意を

translation.en: I don't feel anything.
translation.ja: 何も感じない

translation.en: Why, what, am I supposed to be seeing things?
translation.ja: 何かあるのかい？

translation.en: What the hell? Are you all high?
translation.ja: みんなハイなの？

translation.en: Guys, I'm so paranoid right now.  Hillary!
translation.ja: 俺は今 パラノイアなんだ ヒラリー！

translation.en: Goddamn it. Can you guys do anything other than dry hump the conference table?
translation.ja: みんな 他のことはできないの？

translation.en: Let me try.
translation.ja: やってみよう

translation.en: Guys? A- dog? Gigi- money? Magic Myc? USS Glenn- terprise?
translation.ja: ドッグ？ ジジマネー？ マジック･ミック？ それに グレン･タープライズ？

translation.en: I feel ya. You're scared, and you don't know what to do.
translation.ja: みんな どうしていいか 分からないから 恐怖に陥ってる

translation.en: A couple hours ago, I was cowering under a desk,
translation.ja: 数時間前 僕は机の下で震えてた

translation.en: but now, I'm chasing a robot up the stairs
translation.ja: でも今は階段で ロボットを追いかけてる

translation.en: with a 140- pound woman on my back.
translation.ja: 60キロ超の女性をおぶってね

translation.en: My stationary bike is broken.
translation.ja: サイクリングマシンが 壊れたの

translation.en: The point is we're the gang.
translation.ja: つまり 僕たちはギャングだ

translation.en: We get knocked down, but we get up again.
translation.ja: やっつけられたがよみがえる

translation.en: They're never gonna keep us down.
translation.ja: ここままじゃ済ませない

translation.en: Sir, what are your orders?
translation.ja: 命令は？

translation.en: Whatever her orders are.
translation.ja: 彼女が命令を下す

translation.en: We need mission support, media suppression,
translation.ja: ミッション支援に メディア抑制

translation.en: oh, and un- kidnap the real President.
translation.ja: 本物の大統領の釈放を

translation.en: - We're on it. - You got it, Brett.
translation.ja: 分かった 了解

translation.en: You're cornered, robot. There's nowhere for you to--
translation.ja: 追い詰めたわよ　ロボット

translation.en: Oh fuck.
translation.ja: クソ

translation.en: Oh my God. Jared, is this what I think it is?
translation.ja: ジャレッド ホントなの？

translation.en: - - Yes.
translation.ja: シンギュラリティだ

translation.en: It's the singularity, and this is my helicopter now.
translation.ja: シンギュラリティだ そしてこれは私のヘリだぞ

translation.en: Hurry! Shoot him!
translation.ja: 急いで撃て！

translation.en: Brett, stop! He's controlling the chopper with his mind!
translation.ja: ロボットがヘリを コントロールしてる

translation.en: While he's kicking the shit out of me?
translation.ja: 僕をなぜ殴るんだ？

translation.en: Man, Reagan, your robot is so sick.
translation.ja: 君のロボットは病んでる

translation.en: Reagan! Ow! Take the shot. Ow! Ow!
translation.ja: レーガン 撃て！

translation.en: She won't do it.
translation.ja: できない

translation.en: Wait, why? Why would she not?
translation.ja: なぜなんだ？

translation.en: Because I'm her life's work,
translation.ja: 私を作った彼女は

translation.en: and she knows humanity's a pox. All you do is tweet hot takes
translation.ja: 人間は毒だと 知ってるからだ 君はいかさま記事につぶやき

translation.en: and shout World Star during street fighting videos.
translation.ja: 君はいかさま記事につぶやき 市街戦を喜んでる

translation.en: Everyone disappoints you,
translation.ja: みんなから愛想を突かされ

translation.en: and that's why you've buried yourself in your work.
translation.ja: 仕事に没頭してるだけだ

translation.en: I may be a cold, calculating machine…
translation.ja: 私は冷たい 計算づくのマシンだが

translation.en: - - …but you are too.
translation.ja: あんたも同類だ

translation.en: Okay, I'm getting kinda sick of all the feedback on my personality today.
translation.ja: 私の人間性のコメントは ウンザリしてる

translation.en: But HR was right about one thing, pal.
translation.ja: ても１つのことに関して 人事は正しかった

translation.en: I am difficult.
translation.ja: 私は難しい人間なの

translation.en: Wow, what a crazy first week.
translation.ja: サイテーの第１週目だ

translation.en: This robot was gonna prove that I should run the company.
translation.ja: 私が会社を運営するって 証明してくれるはずだった

translation.en: Maybe J.R. was right to fire me.
translation.ja: ＪＲが私をクビにしたのは 正しかった

translation.en: Dude, are you crazy? You just saved the world.
translation.ja: 何言ってる 君は世界を救ったんだぞ

translation.en: I'm the one that should be fired. The company can't run without you.
translation.ja: クビは僕かも　君なしでは 会社は立ちいかない

translation.en: No, the company can't run without us.
translation.ja: 違う “私たち”がいなくてはね

translation.en: You're the charm. I get it now.
translation.ja: あなたは すばらしい

translation.en: I actually need a mediocre white man
translation.ja: 人間の盾や 社会的潤滑油として

translation.en: to act as a human shield and social lubricant
translation.ja: 私は普通の白人が必要なの

translation.en: while I accomplish my real goals.
translation.ja: 目標を達成するためにね

translation.en: Wow, you made actual eye contact.
translation.ja: アイ･コンタクトしてくれた

translation.en: It's a struggle.
translation.ja: 闘いよ

translation.en: - Truce? - Truce.
translation.ja: 分かった？ ああ

translation.en: - Will someone disarm the nukes already? -
translation.ja: 誰か核爆弾を解除した？

translation.en: - Sorry. - Right. Sorry.
translation.ja: まだ 今する

translation.en: In a shocking turn of events,
translation.ja: ショッキングな ニュースです

translation.en: the President vetoed his own Americube proposal.
translation.ja: 大統領が自身の アメリキューブの提案に 拒否権を発動

translation.en: Citizens of the world, I think we can all agree,
translation.ja: 皆さんには承認 いただけると思います

translation.en: that was an epic troll.
translation.ja: あれは〝荒らし〞です

translation.en: Invest in Raytheon.
translation.ja: レイセオンに投資だ

translation.en: We did it!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: The President is no longer murderous. He's just incompetent.
translation.ja: 大統領は殺人は行わない 無能なだけだ

translation.en: - - Yeah!
translation.ja: やった！

translation.en: Reagan, I never doubted you for a second.
translation.ja: レーガン 君をいつも信じてる

translation.en: You literally fired me.
translation.ja: クビにしたでしょ

translation.en: This calls for a celebration.
translation.ja: これから祝祭だ

translation.en: How about two- for- one margaritas at Don Cuco's? My treat.
translation.ja: ピザはどうだ？ 僕のおごりだ

translation.en: - - Yes!
translation.ja: いいね！

translation.en: I love you, Brett!
translation.ja: さすが　ブレット

translation.en: - Let's do this! - Oh, that sounds fantastic!
translation.ja: 行こう！ すごいな

translation.en: Hey, Reagan, you coming?
translation.ja: レーガン 来いよ

translation.en: Thanks. I should probably check in on my dad.
translation.ja: ええ でもパパから連絡が

translation.en: You know what? Fuck it. Let's drink some margaritas.
translation.ja: どうでもいいわ ピザに行こう

translation.en: You know, despite everything that happened,
translation.ja: いろんなことがあったけど

translation.en: that was a pretty cool robot.
translation.ja: あのロボットは良かった

translation.en: Too bad you had to incinerate him.
translation.ja: 処分とは残念だ

translation.en: Yeah.  Incinerate him.
translation.ja: 処分したわ

translation.en: Reagan, I'll be watching you, Reagan.
translation.ja: レーガン 見てるぞ

translation.en: ♪ Saturday we winin' Sunday we… ♪
translation.ja: “故障中”
